name: project0
description: 1. Get the mvp version to work. Two players, both controlled by the one computer, click for o click for x, winner declared. 2. Build an algorithm opponent. 3. Build an unbeatable algorithm opponent. 4. Give it a personality, have it throw insults at you while it beats you. 5. Add fun animations 6. Add a second personality, maybe one that throws Shakespearian insults at you or something while medieval Eminem loops in the background.
